p.label: Which school year are you interest in? *

input.name: _utf8

p.span: By submitting this form, I expressly consent and authorize ACCEL Schools to contact me at the number(s) provided via text or short message service (SMS) as well as by phone, regarding educational matters. I understand that these calls may be generated using automated technology and that message and data rates may apply, for which I will be solely financially responsible.

div.p: Now Enrolling Grades K – 9 for the Fall!

We are a tuition-free, public charter school serving K-9 students throughout Columbus, OH. We are AdvancED Accredited. Our school is conveniently located on South Hamilton Road, just off of I-70 and I-270. Eastland Preparatory Academy provides a private school-like environment that individualizes learning for each child. Our rigorous academic program exceeds Ohio state standards to provide children with a strong academic foundation and prepare students for college and career. We observe an extended school day and school year, and exceed the 920 hours per school year required by the Ohio Department of Education in order to maximize learning time in each grade level. In 2019, we received a Progress Component Grade of B and a B in Lowest 20% in Achievement.

div.p: Now Enrolling for the 2020-21 School Year!

img.span: All Teachers Properly Certified & Licensed All teachers meet the Every Student Succeeds Act (ESSA) requirements: Bachelor’s degree, grade-level teaching license/certificate & ability to demonstrate subject area expertise.
Accredited by Cognia™ For meeting the highest standards of education in ongoing third-party review.

div.span:
Thank you for choosing Eastland Preparatory Academy
for your child and allowing us to serve your family.
To begin the enrollment process, please click below.
